What Eclipse and Mylyn/Mylar version is this?  Were there any symptoms (e.g. Mylyn failed to start)?  Did it happen again on restart?
I am using Eclipse 3.2 with the corresponding Mylar version downloaded via software update. Mylyn is working fine. I do have a doubt. Will Eclipse 3.1 support all the features of Mylyn existing now?

Created an attachment (id=72140)
mylar/context/zip
